features.title: Never cook again!
features.context: Our subscriptions cover 365 days per year, even including major holidays.

features.title: Local and organic
features.context: Our cooks only use local, fresh, and organic products to prepare your meals.

features.title: No waste
features.context: All our partners only use reusable containers to package all your meals.

features.title: Pause anytime
features.context: Going on vacation? Just pause your subscription, and we refund unused days.
